column3: See Note 7 for details of restructuring and other charges (income). Amounts for the years ended 2012, 2011 and 2010 relate to Agricultural Products of $8.5 million, $1.2 million and $7.3 million; Specialty Chemicals of $13.7 million, $2.2 million and $6.7 million; Industrial Chemicals of $10.6 million, $26.1 million and $124.6 million; and Corporate of $5.3 million, $2.9 million and $13.3 million, respectively.
